name: AMGmedia Works Inc.
description: Whether you’re building your own store, marketing your new venture, or managing your membership online, we’re here to help you. For over 20 years we’ve developed websites for industries from mining, health care, tourism, and the arts through to food and beverage, and even down to your shoes! Not only do our websites help build your business online, but they also fit perfectly with your online social and marketing strategy.
